ComicInfo.Title: Everybody Hurts
ComicInfo.Summary: Razor battles the demented Rush as she straps a bomb to a cop, who was trying to empty a refuge center that she planned to bomb, and is taken aback when Rsh knows her real name. Nicole! The bomb explodes killing the cop and the fight moves to the next building as Rush makes her escape. Something Rush says reminds razor of her sister Stryke. Meanwhile in Spain Knyfe/Kat meets Nicoles daughter Alexis and tries to get her away with her to be like her mother. but Alexis hits her and tells her that she wont be like her mother. Razor battles Rush who tells her she is wired to explode herself and shes hidden a bomb at the clinic and will take out everything she loves. Razor is enraged that she will hurt those she loves and in a flurry shreds the clothes and equipment off Rush and the bomb explodes far enough away for the two of them escape. At Nicole's clinic things seem all clean and the bomb is a fake that comes to life when Rush's body-bomb blows. Its a faxing unit and produces an image of Rush and Razor as purifiers cleaning up the city.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-27 12:50:31. [CVDB177282] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0b3.dev4 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-09-30 22:27:39. [Issue ID 177282]

ComicInfo.Inker: Albert Holaso, Bob Almond, Dave Vance, Slick (Larry Leon Schlekewy Jr.), Steve Scott, Slick, Albert Holaso, Bob Almond, Dave Vance, Slick (Larry Leon Schlekewy Jr.), Steve Scott
